name: Moon Munch Monster
description:
In the far future, a monstrous creature sets out on a quest to devour moons... Unfortunately, the humans there really don't want that to happen.

How to play:

Arrow keys / WASD to move, Z / space to warp to a new zone.

Eating moons increases your score. Be careful, because the moment you get close enough to a moon, it's inhabitants will start the ten second self-destruct countdown, to try to bring you down with it!

Every ten seconds you spend in the game either recharges your warp ability, or increases your multiplier if your warp is already charged. Warping resets your multiplier.

Be warned! Every ten seconds, each planet has a chance to spawn a slightly edible spaceship that hunts you down and fires at you. The longer you stay in a zone, you get more score, but the danger increases.

Comets will fly at you quickly, and damage you, so be careful around them!

Molten moons are moons in the early stages of forming, so they will be molten hot. They give you a lot of points, but also deal damage whenever you bite them.

See how far you can make it, before the spaceships overwhelm you.

This game was created for Mini Jam 130: Lunar, all art, sound, and code was created during the game jam period.
